sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/DonationForm.css'; const donationsAPI = 'http://localhost:3000/donations' export default class DonationForm extends React.Component{ state = { user_id: this.props.currentUser.id, charity_id: this.props.charity.id, donation_amount: 0, donation_date: '', donation_note: '', favorite: null } submitDonation = e => { e.preventDefault() fetch(donationsAPI, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', accept: 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ user_id: this.props.currentUser.id, charity_id: this.props.charity.id }) }) } onChangeHandler = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } render(){ return(
DONOR:   {this.props.currentUser.first_name} {this.props.currentUser.last_name}
RECIPIENT:   {this.props.charity.charity_name}
AMOUNT:  
DATE:  
CREDIT CARD INFO:   {this.props.currentUser.first_name} {this.props.currentUser.last_name}
{this.props.currentUser.cc_type}
{this.props.currentUser.cc_number}
{this.props.currentUser.cc_exp_date} / CVV: 
NOTE:  

CANCEL

) } }
